solution_line_template: First find the length of Carmen's brush in inches: {carmen_longer_percent_num}% * {carla_brush_length_inches} inches = <<{carmen_longer_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{carla_brush_length_inches}={carmen_brush_length_inches}>>{carmen_brush_length_inches} inches

Then convert the length from inches to centimeters: {carmen_brush_length_inches} inches * {cm_per_inch} centimeters/inch = <<{carmen_brush_length_inches}*{cm_per_inch}={carmen_brush_length_cm}>>{carmen_brush_length_cm} centimeters
